sections.comments: All CRWR Winter Term 1 (September-December) courses/sections will be held online. For this particular course, workshops will be synchronous and will be taking place via Zoom and are a mandatory component of fulfilling the expectations of the course.There will be short asynchronous weekly lectures and activity components on Canvas to enhance writers craft studies and to earn participation marks.

description: An intermediate level workshop class in writing of fiction. Manuscript submission is not required for admission.
